<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>

  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<h3>&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;</h3><p>&#x6211;&#x4EEC;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x660E;&#x786E;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x7684;&#x76EE;&#x7684;&#x662F;&#x5C3D;&#x91CF;&#x51CF;&#x5C11;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7684;&#x52A8;&#x6001;&#x53D8;&#x5316;&#x3002;
&#x4F46;&#x662F;&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x4F60;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4EBA;&#x5DE5;&#x533A;&#x5206;&#x8F83;&#x77ED;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x548C;&#x8F83;&#x957F;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#xFF08;&#x4F8B;&#x5982;&#xFF0C;&#x5BF9;&#x6570;&#x7EC4;&#x6C42;&#x548C;&#x6216;&#x6392;&#x5E8F;&#xFF09;&#xFF0C;&#x5219;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x624B;&#x52A8;&#x4E3A;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x521B;&#x5EFA;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x6C60;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5EFA;&#x8BAE;&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x7684;&#x539F;&#x56E0;&#x662F;&#xFF0C;&#x505A;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x5BFC;&#x81F4;&#x989D;&#x5916;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF08;&#x521B;&#x5EFA;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF0C;&#x8868;&#x793A;&#x548C;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x961F;&#x5217;&#xFF09;&#xFF0C;&#x800C;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x4E3A;&#x60A8;&#x8282;&#x7701;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x5916;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF0C;&#x540C;&#x65F6;&#x4E5F;&#x4F1A;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x4F60;&#x5728;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#x72AF;&#x9519;&#x8BEF;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x7684;&#x7F3A;&#x70B9;&#x662F;&#xFF1A;&#x6240;&#x6709;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x6C60;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x90FD;&#x5C06;&#x6D88;&#x8017;&#x7A7A;&#x95F4;&#x548C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF0C;&#x5E76;&#x5C06;&#x76F8;&#x4E92;&#x7ADE;&#x4E89; CPU &#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7247;&#x3002;
&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A; CPU &#x5BC6;&#x96C6;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x53EA;&#x5728;&#x5B83;&#x88AB;&#x8C03;&#x5EA6;&#x5230;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#x624D;&#x4F1A;&#x5F97;&#x5230;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x3002;
&#x56E0;&#x6B64;&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x5E94;&#x8BE5;&#x518D;&#x4ED4;&#x7EC6;&#x5206;&#x6790;&#x540E;&#x624D;&#x8003;&#x8651;&#x6B64;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x3002;</p>
<h3>&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF1A;&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h3><p>&#x65E0;&#x8BBA;&#x60A8;&#x53EA;&#x4F7F;&#x7528; Node &#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x8FD8;&#x662F;&#x7EF4;&#x62A4;&#x5355;&#x72EC;&#x7684;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF0C;&#x90FD;&#x5E94;&#x7740;&#x529B;&#x4F18;&#x5316;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x541E;&#x5410;&#x91CF;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x4E3A;&#x6B64;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x6700;&#x5C0F;&#x5316;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7684;&#x52A8;&#x6001;&#x53D8;&#x5316;&#x8303;&#x56F4;&#x3002;</p>
<h2 id="header-npm">&#x4F7F;&#x7528; npm &#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x7684;&#x98CE;&#x9669;<a id="npm" class="anchor" href="#npm" aria-labelledby="header-npm"></a></h2><p>&#x867D;&#x7136; Node &#x6838;&#x5FC3;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x4E3A;&#x5404;&#x79CD;&#x9700;&#x6C42;&#x63D0;&#x4F9B;&#x4E86;&#x57FA;&#x7840;&#x652F;&#x6301;&#xFF0C;&#x4F46;&#x6709;&#x65F6;&#x8FD8;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x66F4;&#x591A;&#x7684;&#x529F;&#x80FD;&#x3002;Node &#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x4ECE; <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/">npm &#x751F;&#x6001;&#x7CFB;&#x7EDF;</a> &#x4E2D;&#x83B7;&#x76CA;&#x826F;&#x591A;&#xFF0C;&#x6709;&#x6210;&#x767E;&#x4E0A;&#x5343;&#x4E2A;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4E3A;&#x4F60;&#x7684;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x63D0;&#x6548;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x4F46;&#x662F;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF0C;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x5927;&#x591A;&#x6570;&#x662F;&#x7531;&#x7B2C;&#x4E09;&#x65B9;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7F16;&#x5199;&#x7684;&#xFF1B;&#x5B83;&#x4EEC;&#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x53EA;&#x80FD;&#x4FDD;&#x8BC1;&#x5C3D;&#x529B;&#x505A;&#x5230;&#x5F88;&#x597D;&#x3002;&#x4F7F;&#x7528; npm &#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x5E94;&#x8BE5;&#x5173;&#x6CE8;&#x5982;&#x4E0B;&#x4E24;&#x4EF6;&#x4E8B;&#xFF0C;&#x5C3D;&#x7BA1;&#x540E;&#x8005;&#x7ECF;&#x5E38;&#x88AB;&#x9057;&#x5FD8;&#x3002;</p>
<ol>

<p>&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x7B80;&#x5355;&#x7684; API&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4F30;&#x8BA1; API &#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x5982;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5E76;&#x4E0D;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x3002;

<p><em>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x7684; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x4F1A;&#x505A;&#x4E00;&#x4E9B;&#x6602;&#x8D35;&#x7684;&#x4E8B;&#x60C5;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x7740;&#x91CD;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x76F8;&#x5173;&#x6587;&#x6863;&#xFF0C;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6E90;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#xFF08;&#x5E76;&#x63D0;&#x4EA4;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; PR &#x8BF4;&#x660E;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF09;&#x3002;</em></p>

<h2>&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h2><p>Node &#x6709;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x548C; <code>k</code> &#x4E2A;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x3002;

<p>&#x4F8B;&#x5B50; 3&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; <code>O(n^2)</code> &#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x3002; &#x8BE5;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x5C0F;&#x7684;&#x8F93;&#x5165; <code>n</code> &#x540C;&#x6837;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x5F88;&#x5FEB;&#xFF0C; &#x4F46;&#x662F; <code>n</code> &#x5982;&#x679C;&#x5F88;&#x5927;&#xFF0C;&#x4F1A;&#x6BD4;&#x4E4B;&#x524D; <code>O(n)</code> &#x90A3;&#x4E2A;&#x4F8B;&#x5B50;&#x6162;&#x5F97;&#x591A;&#x3002;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/countToN2&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> n <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>n<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// n^2 iterations before giving someone else a turn</span>
  <span class="token keyword">for</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">let</span> i <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> i <span class="token operator">&lt;</span> n<span class="token punctuation">;</span> i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">let</span> j <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> j <span class="token operator">&lt;</span> n<span class="token punctuation">;</span> j<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
      console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token template-string"><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span><span class="token string">Iter </span><span class="token interpolation"><span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">${</span>i<span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">}</span></span><span class="token string">.</span><span class="token interpolation"><span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">${</span>j<span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">}</span></span><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
    <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>
<h3>&#x4F60;&#x5E94;&#x5F53;&#x6CE8;&#x610F;&#x4E9B;&#x4EC0;&#x4E48;&#x5462;&#xFF1F;</h3><p>Node &#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x8C37;&#x6B4C;&#x7684; V8 &#x5F15;&#x64CE;&#x5904;&#x7406; JavaScript&#xFF0C;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x5927;&#x90E8;&#x5206;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x786E;&#x5B9E;&#x5F88;&#x5FEB;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>

<p>&#x4F8B;&#x5B50;2&#xFF1A;&#x5206;&#x533A;&#x7B97;&#x5E73;&#x5747;&#x503C;&#xFF0C;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A; <code>n</code> &#x7684;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x6B65;&#x9AA4;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#x4E3A; <code>O(1)</code>&#x3002;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">function</span> <span class="token function">asyncAvg</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">n<span class="token punctuation">,</span> avgCB</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token comment">// Save ongoing sum in JS closure.</span>
  <span class="token keyword">var</span> sum <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token keyword">function</span> <span class="token function">help</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">i<span class="token punctuation">,</span> cb</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    sum <span class="token operator">+=</span> i<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  <span class="token comment">// Start the helper, with CB to call avgCB.</span>
  <span class="token function">help</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token keyword">function</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">{</span>
      <span class="token keyword">var</span> avg <span class="token operator">=</span> sum<span class="token operator">/</span>n<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
      <span class="token function">avgCB</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>avg<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span>

<span class="token function">asyncAvg</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token keyword">function</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">avg</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;avg of 1-n: &apos;</span> <span class="token operator">+</span> avg<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<p><em>&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;</em> &#x662F;&#x6307;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x968F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x6307;&#x6570;&#x7EA7;&#x589E;&#x957F;&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#xFF0C; &#x5B83;&#x4F7F;&#x60A8;&#x7684;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#x5728;&#x201C;&#x6076;&#x610F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x201D;&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x4E34; <a href="https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Regular_expression_Denial_of_Service_-_ReDoS">REDOS</a> &#xFF08;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x62D2;&#x7EDD;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF09;&#x7684;&#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x4E0D;&#x786E;&#x5B9A;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x662F;&#x5426;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x548C;&#x957F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#xFF0C;Node &#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x4E5F;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x786E;&#x4FDD;&#x7ED3;&#x679C;&#x6B63;&#x786E;&#x5339;&#x914D;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// REDOS</span>
  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;valid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<p>&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x7B80;&#x5355;&#x7684; API&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4F30;&#x8BA1; API &#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x5982;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5E76;&#x4E0D;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x3002;
&#x4F46;&#x5728;&#x8BB8;&#x591A;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x5374;&#x5F88;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#x3002;</p>
<p><em>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x7684; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x4F1A;&#x505A;&#x4E00;&#x4E9B;&#x6602;&#x8D35;&#x7684;&#x4E8B;&#x60C5;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x7740;&#x91CD;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x76F8;&#x5173;&#x6587;&#x6863;&#xFF0C;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6E90;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#xFF08;&#x5E76;&#x63D0;&#x4EA4;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; PR &#x8BF4;&#x660E;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF09;&#x3002;</em></p>
<p>&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F; API &#x662F;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x4E5F;&#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x65E0;&#x6CD5;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x5B83;&#x7684;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x7684;&#x5B50;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x5728;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6216;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E0A;&#x82B1;&#x8D39;&#x591A;&#x5C11;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x3002;
&#x4F8B;&#x5982;&#xFF0C;&#x5047;&#x8BBE;&#x5728;&#x4E0A;&#x9762;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x7684; <code>asyncAvg</code> &#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x4E2D;&#xFF0C;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x5BF9; helper &#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x7684;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x90FD;&#x7D2F;&#x52A0;&#x4E00;&#x534A;&#x7684;&#x6570;&#x5B57;&#x800C;&#x4E0D;&#x53EA;&#x662F;&#x5176;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x3002;
&#x90A3;&#x4E48;&#x8FD9;&#x4E2A;&#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x662F;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x4F46;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x5B50;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5C06;&#x662F; <code>O(n)</code> &#x800C;&#x4E0D;&#x662F; <code>O(1)</code>&#xFF0C; &#x5C31;&#x4F7F;&#x5F97;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4EFB;&#x610F;&#x7684;&#x8F93;&#x5165; <code>n</code> &#x4E0D;&#x518D;&#x90A3;&#x4E48;&#x5B89;&#x5168;&#x3002;</p>
<h2>&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h2><p>Node &#x6709;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x548C; <code>k</code> &#x4E2A;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x3002;
&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x8D1F;&#x8D23; JavaScript &#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x548C;&#x975E;&#x963B;&#x585E; I/O&#xFF0C;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x4E0E; C++ &#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#x5BF9;&#x5E94;&#x7684;&#x3001;&#x5B8C;&#x6210;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#xFF0C;&#x5305;&#x62EC;&#x963B;&#x585E; I/O &#x548C; CPU &#x5BC6;&#x96C6;&#x578B;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x3002;
&#x8FD9;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E00;&#x6B21;&#x90FD;&#x53EA;&#x80FD;&#x5904;&#x7406;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6D3B;&#x52A8;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x4E0D;&#x786E;&#x5B9A;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x662F;&#x5426;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x548C;&#x957F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#xFF0C;Node &#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x4E5F;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x786E;&#x4FDD;&#x7ED3;&#x679C;&#x6B63;&#x786E;&#x5339;&#x914D;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// REDOS</span>
  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;valid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// REDOS</span>
  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;valid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<h3>&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;</h3><p>&#x6211;&#x4EEC;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x660E;&#x786E;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x7684;&#x76EE;&#x7684;&#x662F;&#x5C3D;&#x91CF;&#x51CF;&#x5C11;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7684;&#x52A8;&#x6001;&#x53D8;&#x5316;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5EFA;&#x8BAE;&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x7684;&#x539F;&#x56E0;&#x662F;&#xFF0C;&#x505A;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x5BFC;&#x81F4;&#x989D;&#x5916;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF08;&#x521B;&#x5EFA;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF0C;&#x8868;&#x793A;&#x548C;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x961F;&#x5217;&#xFF09;&#xFF0C;&#x800C;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x4E3A;&#x60A8;&#x8282;&#x7701;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x5916;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF0C;&#x540C;&#x65F6;&#x4E5F;&#x4F1A;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x4F60;&#x5728;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#x72AF;&#x9519;&#x8BEF;&#x3002;</p>

<h3>&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF1A;&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h3><p>&#x65E0;&#x8BBA;&#x60A8;&#x53EA;&#x4F7F;&#x7528; Node &#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x8FD8;&#x662F;&#x7EF4;&#x62A4;&#x5355;&#x72EC;&#x7684;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF0C;&#x90FD;&#x5E94;&#x7740;&#x529B;&#x4F18;&#x5316;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x541E;&#x5410;&#x91CF;&#x3002;</p>

&#x7136;&#x540E;&#xFF0C;Node &#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#x8FDB;&#x5165;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x9636;&#x6BB5;&#xFF0C;&#x901A;&#x8FC7;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x5BF9;&#x5E94;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x6765;&#x5BF9;&#x5BA2;&#x6237;&#x7AEF;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x505A;&#x51FA;&#x56DE;&#x5E94;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>

  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>

  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

<h3>&#x4E0D;&#x8981;&#x8BA9;&#x590D;&#x6742;&#x7684;&#x8BA1;&#x7B97;&#x963B;&#x585E;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;</h3><p>&#x5047;&#x8BBE;&#x4F60;&#x60F3;&#x5728; JavaScript &#x5904;&#x7406;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x590D;&#x6742;&#x7684;&#x8BA1;&#x7B97;&#xFF0C;&#x800C;&#x53C8;&#x4E0D;&#x60F3;&#x963B;&#x585E;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5EFA;&#x8BAE;&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x7684;&#x539F;&#x56E0;&#x662F;&#xFF0C;&#x505A;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x5BFC;&#x81F4;&#x989D;&#x5916;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF08;&#x521B;&#x5EFA;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF0C;&#x8868;&#x793A;&#x548C;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x961F;&#x5217;&#xFF09;&#xFF0C;&#x800C;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4F1A;&#x4E3A;&#x60A8;&#x8282;&#x7701;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x5916;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF0C;&#x540C;&#x65F6;&#x4E5F;&#x4F1A;&#x907F;&#x514D;&#x4F60;&#x5728;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#x72AF;&#x9519;&#x8BEF;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x7684;&#x7F3A;&#x70B9;&#x662F;&#xFF1A;&#x6240;&#x6709;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x6C60;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x90FD;&#x5C06;&#x6D88;&#x8017;&#x7A7A;&#x95F4;&#x548C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF0C;&#x5E76;&#x5C06;&#x76F8;&#x4E92;&#x7ADE;&#x4E89; CPU &#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7247;&#x3002;
&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A; CPU &#x5BC6;&#x96C6;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x53EA;&#x5728;&#x5B83;&#x88AB;&#x8C03;&#x5EA6;&#x5230;&#x7684;&#x65F6;&#x5019;&#x624D;&#x4F1A;&#x5F97;&#x5230;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x3002;
&#x56E0;&#x6B64;&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x5E94;&#x8BE5;&#x518D;&#x4ED4;&#x7EC6;&#x5206;&#x6790;&#x540E;&#x624D;&#x8003;&#x8651;&#x6B64;&#x65B9;&#x6848;&#x3002;</p>
<h3>&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF1A;&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h3><p>&#x65E0;&#x8BBA;&#x60A8;&#x53EA;&#x4F7F;&#x7528; Node &#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x8FD8;&#x662F;&#x7EF4;&#x62A4;&#x5355;&#x72EC;&#x7684;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#xFF0C;&#x90FD;&#x5E94;&#x7740;&#x529B;&#x4F18;&#x5316;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6C60;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x541E;&#x5410;&#x91CF;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x4E3A;&#x6B64;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x6700;&#x5C0F;&#x5316;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x7684;&#x52A8;&#x6001;&#x53D8;&#x5316;&#x8303;&#x56F4;&#x3002;</p>
<h2 id="header-npm">&#x4F7F;&#x7528; npm &#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x7684;&#x98CE;&#x9669;<a id="npm" class="anchor" href="#npm" aria-labelledby="header-npm"></a></h2><p>&#x867D;&#x7136; Node &#x6838;&#x5FC3;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x4E3A;&#x5404;&#x79CD;&#x9700;&#x6C42;&#x63D0;&#x4F9B;&#x4E86;&#x57FA;&#x7840;&#x652F;&#x6301;&#xFF0C;&#x4F46;&#x6709;&#x65F6;&#x8FD8;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x66F4;&#x591A;&#x7684;&#x529F;&#x80FD;&#x3002;Node &#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x4ECE; <a href="https://www.npmjs.com/">npm &#x751F;&#x6001;&#x7CFB;&#x7EDF;</a> &#x4E2D;&#x83B7;&#x76CA;&#x826F;&#x591A;&#xFF0C;&#x6709;&#x6210;&#x767E;&#x4E0A;&#x5343;&#x4E2A;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4E3A;&#x4F60;&#x7684;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x63D0;&#x6548;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x4F46;&#x662F;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF0C;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x5927;&#x591A;&#x6570;&#x662F;&#x7531;&#x7B2C;&#x4E09;&#x65B9;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7F16;&#x5199;&#x7684;&#xFF1B;&#x5B83;&#x4EEC;&#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x53EA;&#x80FD;&#x4FDD;&#x8BC1;&#x5C3D;&#x529B;&#x505A;&#x5230;&#x5F88;&#x597D;&#x3002;&#x4F7F;&#x7528; npm &#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x5E94;&#x8BE5;&#x5173;&#x6CE8;&#x5982;&#x4E0B;&#x4E24;&#x4EF6;&#x4E8B;&#xFF0C;&#x5C3D;&#x7BA1;&#x540E;&#x8005;&#x7ECF;&#x5E38;&#x88AB;&#x9057;&#x5FD8;&#x3002;</p>
<ol>

<p>&#x8BB8;&#x591A;&#x6A21;&#x5757;&#x5BF9;&#x5B83;&#x4EEC; API &#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#x6CA1;&#x6709;&#x4EFB;&#x4F55;&#x8003;&#x8651;&#xFF0C;&#x8FD9;&#x5BF9;&#x793E;&#x533A;&#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x8005;&#x662F;&#x4E0D;&#x5229;&#x7684;&#x3002;</p>
<p>&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x7B80;&#x5355;&#x7684; API&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4F30;&#x8BA1; API &#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x5982;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5E76;&#x4E0D;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x3002;

<p><em>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x7684; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x4F1A;&#x505A;&#x4E00;&#x4E9B;&#x6602;&#x8D35;&#x7684;&#x4E8B;&#x60C5;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x7740;&#x91CD;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x76F8;&#x5173;&#x6587;&#x6863;&#xFF0C;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6E90;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#xFF08;&#x5E76;&#x63D0;&#x4EA4;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; PR &#x8BF4;&#x660E;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF09;&#x3002;</em></p>
<p>&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F; API &#x662F;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x4E5F;&#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x65E0;&#x6CD5;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x5B83;&#x7684;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x7684;&#x5B50;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x5728;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6216;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E0A;&#x82B1;&#x8D39;&#x591A;&#x5C11;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x3002;

<h2>&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h2><p>Node &#x6709;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x548C; <code>k</code> &#x4E2A;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x3002;

&#x8FD9;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E00;&#x6B21;&#x90FD;&#x53EA;&#x80FD;&#x5904;&#x7406;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6D3B;&#x52A8;&#x3002;

&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x4F60;&#x7684;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#x53D1;&#x8D77;&#x963B;&#x585E;&#x7684;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x6216;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#xFF0C;&#x5728;&#x597D;&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x8FD9;&#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x53EA;&#x4F1A;&#x5BFC;&#x81F4;&#x541E;&#x5410;&#x91CF;&#x4E0B;&#x964D;&#xFF08;&#x5BA2;&#x6237;&#x7AEF;/&#x79D2;&#xFF09;&#xFF0C;&#x800C;&#x5728;&#x6700;&#x574F;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x4F1A;&#x5BFC;&#x81F4;&#x5B8C;&#x5168;&#x62D2;&#x7EDD;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x3002;</p>

<p>&#x4F8B;&#x5B50; 3&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; <code>O(n^2)</code> &#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x3002; &#x8BE5;&#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x5C0F;&#x7684;&#x8F93;&#x5165; <code>n</code> &#x540C;&#x6837;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x5F88;&#x5FEB;&#xFF0C; &#x4F46;&#x662F; <code>n</code> &#x5982;&#x679C;&#x5F88;&#x5927;&#xFF0C;&#x4F1A;&#x6BD4;&#x4E4B;&#x524D; <code>O(n)</code> &#x90A3;&#x4E2A;&#x4F8B;&#x5B50;&#x6162;&#x5F97;&#x591A;&#x3002;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/countToN2&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> n <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>n<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// n^2 iterations before giving someone else a turn</span>
  <span class="token keyword">for</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">let</span> i <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> i <span class="token operator">&lt;</span> n<span class="token punctuation">;</span> i<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token keyword">let</span> j <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span> j <span class="token operator">&lt;</span> n<span class="token punctuation">;</span> j<span class="token operator">++</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
      console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token template-string"><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span><span class="token string">Iter </span><span class="token interpolation"><span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">${</span>i<span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">}</span></span><span class="token string">.</span><span class="token interpolation"><span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">${</span>j<span class="token interpolation-punctuation punctuation">}</span></span><span class="token template-punctuation string">`</span></span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
    <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>
<h3>&#x4F60;&#x5E94;&#x5F53;&#x6CE8;&#x610F;&#x4E9B;&#x4EC0;&#x4E48;&#x5462;&#xFF1F;</h3><p>Node &#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x8C37;&#x6B4C;&#x7684; V8 &#x5F15;&#x64CE;&#x5904;&#x7406; JavaScript&#xFF0C;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x5927;&#x90E8;&#x5206;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x786E;&#x5B9E;&#x5F88;&#x5FEB;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>

<p>&#x4F8B;&#x5B50;2&#xFF1A;&#x5206;&#x533A;&#x7B97;&#x5E73;&#x5747;&#x503C;&#xFF0C;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A; <code>n</code> &#x7684;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x6B65;&#x9AA4;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#x4E3A; <code>O(1)</code>&#x3002;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript"><span class="token keyword">function</span> <span class="token function">asyncAvg</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">n<span class="token punctuation">,</span> avgCB</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token comment">// Save ongoing sum in JS closure.</span>
  <span class="token keyword">var</span> sum <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token keyword">function</span> <span class="token function">help</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">i<span class="token punctuation">,</span> cb</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    sum <span class="token operator">+=</span> i<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  <span class="token comment">// Start the helper, with CB to call avgCB.</span>
  <span class="token function">help</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token keyword">function</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">{</span>
      <span class="token keyword">var</span> avg <span class="token operator">=</span> sum<span class="token operator">/</span>n<span class="token punctuation">;</span>
      <span class="token function">avgCB</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>avg<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span>

<span class="token function">asyncAvg</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token keyword">function</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">avg</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;avg of 1-n: &apos;</span> <span class="token operator">+</span> avg<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<p><em>&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;</em> &#x662F;&#x6307;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x968F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x6307;&#x6570;&#x7EA7;&#x589E;&#x957F;&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#xFF0C; &#x5B83;&#x4F7F;&#x60A8;&#x7684;&#x5E94;&#x7528;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#x5728;&#x201C;&#x6076;&#x610F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x201D;&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x4E34; <a href="https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Regular_expression_Denial_of_Service_-_ReDoS">REDOS</a> &#xFF08;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x62D2;&#x7EDD;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF09;&#x7684;&#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x4E0D;&#x786E;&#x5B9A;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x662F;&#x5426;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x548C;&#x957F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#xFF0C;Node &#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x4E5F;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x786E;&#x4FDD;&#x7ED3;&#x679C;&#x6B63;&#x786E;&#x5339;&#x914D;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// REDOS</span>
  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;valid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>

<p>&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x7B80;&#x5355;&#x7684; API&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4F30;&#x8BA1; API &#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x5982;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#x64CD;&#x4F5C;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5E76;&#x4E0D;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x3002;
&#x4F46;&#x5728;&#x8BB8;&#x591A;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#x5374;&#x5F88;&#x96BE;&#x9884;&#x4F30; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x7684;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#x3002;</p>
<p><em>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x7684; API &#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x4F1A;&#x505A;&#x4E00;&#x4E9B;&#x6602;&#x8D35;&#x7684;&#x4E8B;&#x60C5;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x7740;&#x91CD;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#xFF1B;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x5F00;&#x53D1;&#x4EBA;&#x5458;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x76F8;&#x5173;&#x6587;&#x6863;&#xFF0C;&#x6216;&#x8005;&#x81EA;&#x5DF1;&#x68C0;&#x67E5;&#x6E90;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#xFF08;&#x5E76;&#x63D0;&#x4EA4;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; PR &#x8BF4;&#x660E;&#x5F00;&#x9500;&#xFF09;&#x3002;</em></p>
<p>&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F; API &#x662F;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x60A8;&#x4E5F;&#x53EF;&#x80FD;&#x65E0;&#x6CD5;&#x9884;&#x4F30;&#x5B83;&#x7684;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x62C6;&#x5206;&#x7684;&#x5B50;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x5728;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6216;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E0A;&#x82B1;&#x8D39;&#x591A;&#x5C11;&#x65F6;&#x95F4;&#x3002;
&#x4F8B;&#x5982;&#xFF0C;&#x5047;&#x8BBE;&#x5728;&#x4E0A;&#x9762;&#x7ED9;&#x51FA;&#x7684; <code>asyncAvg</code> &#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x4E2D;&#xFF0C;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x5BF9; helper &#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x7684;&#x8C03;&#x7528;&#x90FD;&#x7D2F;&#x52A0;&#x4E00;&#x534A;&#x7684;&#x6570;&#x5B57;&#x800C;&#x4E0D;&#x53EA;&#x662F;&#x5176;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x3002;
&#x90A3;&#x4E48;&#x8FD9;&#x4E2A;&#x51FD;&#x6570;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x662F;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x4F46;&#x6BCF;&#x4E2A;&#x5B50;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#x7684;&#x6210;&#x672C;&#x5C06;&#x662F; <code>O(n)</code> &#x800C;&#x4E0D;&#x662F; <code>O(1)</code>&#xFF0C; &#x5C31;&#x4F7F;&#x5F97;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4EFB;&#x610F;&#x7684;&#x8F93;&#x5165; <code>n</code> &#x4E0D;&#x518D;&#x90A3;&#x4E48;&#x5B89;&#x5168;&#x3002;</p>
<h2>&#x603B;&#x7ED3;</h2><p>Node &#x6709;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#xFF1A;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x548C; <code>k</code> &#x4E2A;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x3002;
&#x4E8B;&#x4EF6;&#x5FAA;&#x73AF;&#x8D1F;&#x8D23; JavaScript &#x56DE;&#x8C03;&#x548C;&#x975E;&#x963B;&#x585E; I/O&#xFF0C;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x4E0E; C++ &#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#x5BF9;&#x5E94;&#x7684;&#x3001;&#x5B8C;&#x6210;&#x5F02;&#x6B65;&#x8BF7;&#x6C42;&#x7684;&#x4EFB;&#x52A1;&#xFF0C;&#x5305;&#x62EC;&#x963B;&#x585E; I/O &#x548C; CPU &#x5BC6;&#x96C6;&#x578B;&#x5DE5;&#x4F5C;&#x3002;
&#x8FD9;&#x4E24;&#x79CD;&#x7C7B;&#x578B;&#x7684;&#x7EBF;&#x7A0B;&#x4E00;&#x6B21;&#x90FD;&#x53EA;&#x80FD;&#x5904;&#x7406;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6D3B;&#x52A8;&#x3002;

<p>&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x60A8;&#x4E0D;&#x786E;&#x5B9A;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x662F;&#x5426;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#xFF0C;&#x8BF7;&#x8BB0;&#x4F4F;&#xFF1A;&#x5373;&#x4F7F;&#x5BF9;&#x4E8E;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x6613;&#x53D7;&#x653B;&#x51FB;&#x7684;&#x6B63;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x8FBE;&#x5F0F;&#x548C;&#x957F;&#x8F93;&#x5165;&#x5B57;&#x7B26;&#x4E32;&#xFF0C;Node &#x901A;&#x5E38;&#x4E5F;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x786E;&#x4FDD;&#x7ED3;&#x679C;&#x6B63;&#x786E;&#x5339;&#x914D;&#x3002;

<h4 id="header-redos-1">&#x4E00;&#x4E2A; REDOS &#x4F8B;&#x5B50;<a id="redos-1" class="anchor" href="#redos-1" aria-labelledby="header-redos-1"></a></h4><p>&#x4E0B;&#x9762;&#x662F;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x7ED9;&#x670D;&#x52A1;&#x5668;&#x5E26;&#x6765; REDOS &#x98CE;&#x9669;&#x7684;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#xFF1A;</p>
<pre class="language-javascript"><code class="language-javascript">app<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">get</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;/redos-me&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token parameter">req<span class="token punctuation">,</span> res</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token operator">=&gt;</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="token keyword">let</span> filePath <span class="token operator">=</span> req<span class="token punctuation">.</span>query<span class="token punctuation">.</span>filePath<span class="token punctuation">;</span>

  <span class="token comment">// REDOS</span>
  <span class="token keyword">if</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>fileName<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">match</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token regex">/(\/.+)+$/</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;valid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>
  <span class="token keyword">else</span> <span class="token punctuation">{</span>
    console<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">log</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">&apos;invalid path&apos;</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
  <span class="token punctuation">}</span>

  res<span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token function">sendStatus</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span>
<span class="token punctuation">}</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">;</span></code></pre>
